column2:
```r
yr = 1970
data %>%
  filter((year >= yr) & (year <= yr + 9)) %>%
  pull(prcp) %>%
  hist(breaks = 1000, plot = FALSE) -> hist
hist$counts %>% sum() -> sum
x <- hist$mids 
y <- hist$counts/sum 
data.frame(x, y) -> dens 
mod <- drm(data = dens, y ~ log(x), fct = EXD.2())
d <- mod$parmMat[1]
e <- mod$parmMat[2]
k <- 1/e/d
1 - pexp(log(1000)*k, d)
```
